properties.name: jwt.secret-key
properties.description: A random 32 bytes string encoded in base64

properties.name: jwt.expiration-time
properties.description: The JWT's expiration time in miliseconds

properties.name: seeders.users.admin-user.email
properties.description: The email of the default admin user

properties.name: seeders.users.admin-user.password
properties.description: The password of the default admin user. It should follow the password policy. Check the `RegisterUserDto` class for more details
